channel.title: Staff Icons (mod,admin,helper,donator)
channel.description: Can someone please help me add custom icons to my client? I have made my own Helper and Donator icons and I want to add them into my server/client. Just like the Player Moderator and Administrator crowns. If you can help me please do. You can add me on Skype if you want, but I DO NOT have Team Viewer, and I can not get TV. Please try to help me. Thank you. Skype: modcodygodex

item.title: Staff Icons (mod,admin,helper,donator)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Please keep in mind I highly suggest using an IDE for this…

You will need to add code to one of these two

[hr]

Now look for something like

and add your new set of code there(this is for private messaging)

[hr]

now lets get clan chat done!

if(chatType == 16) { int j2 = 40+11; int clanNameWidth = textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(clanname);

Make sure you give this one a good rewrite cause most PI’s have this incorrect.

[hr]

Okay the fun part is done…now go to this:

and change code as needed.

[hr]

Don’t worry we are almost done!

Go to this next:

and change as needed.

[hr]

Go to buildFriendChat(int j)

change as needed.

[hr]

go to buildDuelorTrade(int j)

change as needed

[hr]

go to buildChatAreaMenu(int j)

change as needed

[hr]

This next one may take a little guessing on the variable name I know I have seen a few different ways it is labeled.

in the same area look for :

textDrawingArea.method385(0, "From", l, k1); textDrawingArea.method385(65535, "From", l - 1

and change as needed

[hr]

again this may be labeled a little different so play with it

change as needed.

[hr]

Go to buildSplitPrivateChatMenu()

change as needed

[hr]

change as needed.

[hr]

NOTE: this next part you may or may not need but either way make sure you have the correct number in here!

look for something like:

modIcons = new Sprite[7]; chatImages = new Sprite[7];

[hr]

almost there…

go to startup()

and make sure everything is correct under the MODICONS section.

Read full topic
